price: 117. Yalli usuk tookomc ceelallo maleh Qimbok (Awwuqtak) qaranwaa kee Baaxo gine Rabbi kinni, caagiidak caagidik teyna meklam faxe kaa tekkek, Toysa cagalah tik kaak iyyaah edde yakke.
arabic: بَدِيعُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَإِذَا قَضَىٰٓ أَمۡرٗا فَإِنَّمَا يَقُولُ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: badīʿu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa-idhā qaḍā amran fa-innamā yaqūlu lahu kun fayakūnu
